Authors: Knapp, Deborah Erdos; Hogue, Mary; Polites, Greta L.
Article Title: The biopsychosocial experience of sexual harassment: the concomitant effects of being harassed and response choice
Abstract: PRACTICE IMPACT STATEMENT Our integrative model can provide a cohesive framework to guide both organisations and researchers interested in understanding and improving victim outcomes by reducing the likelihood that sexual harassment will occur and by encouraging response choices that require fewer coping resources.
